title: Biomimetic nanocarriers loaded with temozolomide by cloaking brain-targeting peptides for targeting drug delivery system to promote anticancer effects in glioblastoma cells
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Huaming Chen, Yunhong Wang, Hai Wang, Kun Zhang, Yunfei Liu, Qiangfeng Li, Chengli Li, Zhonghui Wen, Ziyu Chen
